website_summaries.verdict: Delivers quite a bit of power for its price point, and it has more advanced features than you’d think.
pros: It ships with everything you need to start using it immediately
Includes a large wing reflector that helps you make the most of the light that’s generated
cons: Generates more heat than you’d like to see, and it doesn’t ship with a fan

customer_reviews.title: Timer failed after a few weeks of use.  However -
customer_reviews.text: Lamp,and the digital power supply (ballast) work great so far but the timer failed to function after two weeks of use. The only way to obtain a replacement is to mail back the entire lamp system at my cost. Not worth it for a cheap timer. Buyer beware. UPDATE - I contacted the seller directly and they mailed me a replacement timer at no cost. Let's hope the replacement timer lasts longer than the original. I've bumped my review rating from 1 to 4 stars given the prompt customer service.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work well, have only been using it around 2 weeks. I love the harness/hanging kit provided for the light, it makes it very easy to adjust even after hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, and poorly built light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Havent even used it yet seems pretty decent but the bulb they send with is weighes so much that it makes the hole fixture bend and is super flimsy, it needs a second support for the bulb or something, poor design
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not bullet-proof, but you shouldn’t be messing around with it after you install it. Very bright. Plants are super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Demerit

customer_reviews.title: Anazing
customer_reviews.text: WOAH. The light has multiple settings. 600, 750, 1000 and 1000+. I don't use 1k+ because it'll burn your light out quicker. 750 really is a sweet spot. Love this light
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Replaced after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months and now the ballast is not working. Edit* They responded Immediately and got a replacement shipped out for free. Real easy. But being without my main flowering light for 10 days while in week 5 flower wasn't good.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ballast
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old Diamond 1000w hps, this is much quieter, just as bright, and stable. I was able to remove socket and cord assembly and put it in the old Diamond reflector with glass. Still new, but hopeful it last long :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great price point and 5 out of 6 i have purchased have been fine..
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. had to send one ballast back because it was faulty. however if you get a decent one they work fine.. be prepared to test them and potentially send back until you get one that was actually assembled correctly.
customer_reviews.author: dave rubins

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall best grow light value for mh and hps light system. Electronic ballast is state of the art. Timer works flawlessly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Green Hill Farm

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the fixture but the cooling is the best. Better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Della Bates

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice combo for price. Kind of hot as expected but the dimmable setting is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan champion

customer_reviews.title: exellent prodouct
customer_reviews.text: everything u need to have to start and finish any grow i start my plants at 500watts at the veg stage then when they start to make their fruit i zap em with the 1000 non bad on the power bill either
customer_reviews.author: daniel glass

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ballast
customer_reviews.text: after 2 weeks the bulb died on me and 2 days after that, the ballast also died. I called iPower customer service and they were very good. They took care of me and replaced both the bulb and the ballast.
customer_reviews.author: Horace Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Ballast went out at day 60. Unable to reach seller to see about exchange/refund
customer_reviews.text: The ballast has failed almost exactly 60 days from install. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: ClintOare

product_meta.title: iPower 6000 Watt HPS MH Digital Dimmable Ballast Grow Light System Kits Horticulture Wing Reflector Hood Set
product_meta.description: Size:600W, HPS MHiPower 600 Watt HPS MH Digital Dimmable Grow Light System Kits Wing Reflector Set with Timer
feature_bullets: 600W Digital Dimmable Electronic Ballast: Support 120V/240V Input; Dimmable Options: 50%, 75%, 100%; 8 Feet heavy-duty power cord included; Stable power output ensure flicker free light
1 x 600W Super HPS bulb 2100K; 1 x 600W MH bulb 6000K; optimized Spectrum and high PAR (photosynthetic active radiation) to promote healthy plant growth and soonest flourish
1 x pair of 8-ft adjustable ratchet clip hanger rope: hold up to 150 lbs.; 7-day digital programmable timer: dual Outlets

19-inch Wing Reflector: up to 4' x 4' light coverage; Built-in 15 feet heavy duty lamp cord with E39 Ceramic Mogul Socket and standard Hydroponic S-Plug; highly 95% reflective textured German aluminum maximizes the light reflected to the plants

Caution: this system will generate too much heat to be used in an enclosed area without ventilation. Adequate ventilation is required for all iPower grow light systems. We recommend the use of an iPower inline fan

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
